Universal.definition: encompassing or burdening all of one's property esp. causa mortis [granted him a usufruct] see also universal legacy at legacy compare universal title at title b

sub_terms.a: encompassing or burdening all of one's property esp. causa mortis [granted him a usufruct] see alsoatcompareat
sub_terms.b: of or relating to a universal conveyance or a conveyance under a universal title [a donee] see also

2.definition: not confined by limitations or exceptionsgeneral in application
